ovdesc.p: Used to generate ad-hoc SWIFT MT570 messages requesting an MT571 from a depository. A statement detailing the entire holdings or a subset of them. The subset may either be for a specified sub-account, a specified sub-account and securities or specified sub-accounts and securities. Selected securities must have a valid ISIN code.
